name: Peter Strzok
summary: Former FBI counterintelligence official who was fired by Trump and warned that Trump's actions 'absolutely pose a national security threat.'

keyStatements.quote: I absolutely believe that Trump's actions pose a national security threat. His refusal to acknowledge Russian interference and his attacks on our intelligence agencies are dangerous.
The president's conduct is the definition of a counterintelligence threat.
When I look at what Russia did in 2016, and I look at what President Trump has done since, the concern is that he may be compromised.

credibility.background: Former FBI Deputy Assistant Director, 22-year career in counterintelligence
positions: Deputy Assistant Director, FBI Counterintelligence Division
Lead investigator on major counterintelligence cases

oppositionReasons: Trump's actions pose a national security threat
Trump's conduct is a counterintelligence threat
Trump may be compromised by Russia
Trump refuses to acknowledge Russian interference

sources.title: Peter Strzok: Trump is a national security threat
List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
